Others: The Dallas Mavericks are on a five-game losing streak and are looking to avoid matching their worst stretch since dropping six in a row from Jan 23-Feb 1, 2021.
Superstar Luka Doncic is out with a left calf strain and will be re-evaluated at the end of January.
Kyrie Irving will be sidelined at least a week with a bulging disk in his back.
Center Daniel Gafford sprained his left ankle and is expected to miss some time.
The Lakers had won seven of nine games before their 119-115 loss in Houston against the Rockets.
Anthony Davis collected 30 points and 13 rebounds to increase his team-leading averages to 26.0 points and 11.8 boards per contest.
